title: Tasty Chicken Egg Scramble ( Leftover ) Recipe
content:
Quick and easy chicken egg scramble which not only taste amazing but takes only 5 mins to make. Easy and fast lunch or breakfast.

 

Chicken Egg Scramble Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 25 mins

 

Recipe type: Breakfast

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Onion - 1 chopped finely

Capsicum - ¼ chopped finely

Green Chillies - 2 chopped finely

Cooked chicken - 1 cup shredded

Eggs - 2

Salt to taste

Black Pepper to taste

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan.

Add onion, chilies, and capsicum and stir for a min.

Add in chicken and mix well.

Add eggs and mix well.

Season with salt and pepper and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Chicken Omelette ( Leftover Chicken ) Recipes
recommendations.content:
Healthy chicken omelette which is not only delicious but is very easy to make. You can serve it with rice or enjoy on its own.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
